chapter.title: Resource StatisticData
chapter.para: The Statistic Manager provides an Interface to write statistic records.

Parameter of the interface-call is an xml-record, according to the statistic-data-schema. The xml-record contains one or more elements 'parameter' with an attribute 'name' and a subelement 'stringvalue', 'decimalvalue' or 'datevalue'. This allows to be very flexible and write whatever data the caller wants to write.
The user that calls the interface has to have permissions to write content for the scope defined in the statistic-data-xml. (see chapter ‘security concept’)
The statistic-record is written into a database-table, further referenced as statistics-table. Additionally the timestamp is written into the statistics-table.
